metadata.title: CVE-2024-41026 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mmc: davinci_mmc: Prevent transmitted data size from exceeding sgm's lengthNo check is done on the size of the data to be transmiited. This causesa kernel panic when this size exceeds the sg_miter's length.Limit the number of transmitted bytes to sgm->length.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
